nav.div: Edmonds School District¬†¬ª¬†Departments¬†¬ª¬†Transportation Services¬†¬ª¬†2019-20 Weather Emergency School Closure Info

a.title: Weather Emergency Notice for Families - Spanish PDF

strong.a: Avisos de emergencias meteorol√≥gicas¬†para las FAMILIAS

p.span: The Edmonds School District serves nearly 20,000 students from the communities of Brier, Edmonds, Lynnwood, Mountlake Terrace, Woodway, and portions of¬†Snohomish County. If it is necessary to have a late start or close schools due to inclement weather, this is a district-wide decision for all schools.

li.span: Automated phone calls to District families
Automated text messages to District families ‚Äì Please opt in by texting ‚ÄúYes‚Äù to 67587, more information online at http://bit.ly/ESDtext
Mobile app alerts ‚Äì Please download Edmonds School District‚Äôs mobile app, Edmonds K12
Announcements on district and school websites
Announcements on social media ‚Äì Please follow us on Twitter, www.twitter.com/EdmondsSchools; Facebook, www.facebook.com/EdmondsSchools/; Instagram www.instagram.com/EdmondsSchools/.
